alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Dallas; Guthrie; Polk; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 26 at 2:48AM CST until January 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Bitter Cold Continues Through Midday Today... .Cold temperatures and bitter cold wind chill values continue overnight into midday today. While winds are light, air temperatures have dropped below zero across the area with temperatures of 15 to 20 below zero continuing in parts of northern Iowa into this morning. Wind chill values of 20 to 35 below zero, or colder, will persist through mid morning to midday today, the coldest values in northern and northeastern Iowa this morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Parts of central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
